65a2ad87-c211-440a-b4be-f02473124d67.name: Coal
65a2ad87-c211-440a-b4be-f02473124d67.description: Gleaming with a celestial shine, this bar is believed to be blessed by the gods.

e261e59b-a681-413f-97a3-eb176a206219.name: Coal
e261e59b-a681-413f-97a3-eb176a206219.description: This vibrant green bar holds incredible resistance. Often sought after for the toughest of armors.

a76259b7-6838-4e66-bb39-de466712c608.name: Ancient Ore
a76259b7-6838-4e66-bb39-de466712c608.description: A relic from a bygone age, this bar holds the wisdom and power of ancient civilizations.

3a5cbeed-13e9-4906-bfd6-cdc18f1048b0.name: Coal
3a5cbeed-13e9-4906-bfd6-cdc18f1048b0.description: Radiating with a bright, golden shine, this bar is imbued with the essence of sunlit realms. Said to be the material of the gods.

f07333e4-bdd0-4f63-94f8-ef2287089945.name: Tin Ore
f07333e4-bdd0-4f63-94f8-ef2287089945.description: A solid bar of bronze, crafted by combining copper and tin. Often used for beginner crafts.

771e6a95-36b2-4da6-b5d8-3f1ebeba5bef.name: Coal
771e6a95-36b2-4da6-b5d8-3f1ebeba5bef.description: Forged in dragonfire, this bar has a fiery red glow and is said to contain the spirit of dragons.

0ae20144-f61c-4b77-b7d8-ddf2779fd482.name: Ethereum Ore
0ae20144-f61c-4b77-b7d8-ddf2779fd482.description: Refined from its dark purple ore, this bar seems to hum with otherworldly energy.

e4b7449d-1a58-4c43-a8ad-0dd4b8a6b353.name: Coal
e4b7449d-1a58-4c43-a8ad-0dd4b8a6b353.description: This opulent bar of pure gold exudes wealth and prestige. Prized by royalty and artisans alike, it has been a symbol of power and luxury for eons.

ba8f06fc-fba7-4012-a37a-63b69a29d933.name: Iron Ore
ba8f06fc-fba7-4012-a37a-63b69a29d933.description: This hardy bar of iron is often used as the backbone of many strong tools and weapons.

6feab5fc-993f-4f77-b85e-b0e59a7eb1cf.name: Coal
6feab5fc-993f-4f77-b85e-b0e59a7eb1cf.description: Golden and majestic, this bar is as fierce and noble as the creature it's named after.

2dec4e72-2698-4982-b59f-fd214caccbc6.name: Mithril Ore
2dec4e72-2698-4982-b59f-fd214caccbc6.description: A shimmering bar of mithril, lightweight and durable. Favored in the crafting of elven artifacts.

e8431d6f-5607-4c26-b053-c7ee83dbafe4.name: Phantom Ore
e8431d6f-5607-4c26-b053-c7ee83dbafe4.description: This ethereal bar seems to phase in and out of existence, perfect for crafting ghostly tools and armor.

62327514-a850-43de-a16b-e43b1c3db665.name: Coal
62327514-a850-43de-a16b-e43b1c3db665.description: Engraved with ancient symbols, this bar possesses magical properties that make it invaluable in enchanting.

25c54cc8-ac29-4c90-95d6-4b540fe1cbcd.name: Coal
25c54cc8-ac29-4c90-95d6-4b540fe1cbcd.description: A gleaming bar of refined silver, its lustrous shine catching the eye of any who behold it. Valued for its conductivity and malleability in various crafts.

73ba55c2-51f5-4ceb-9d1e-6d198a3ec0d5.name: Coal
73ba55c2-51f5-4ceb-9d1e-6d198a3ec0d5.description: A bar of steel, known for its superior strength compared to iron. A common choice for advanced weaponry.

612ac9ee-110b-4ffb-972e-8a3aa3289915.name: Coal
612ac9ee-110b-4ffb-972e-8a3aa3289915.description: A small container made of glass. Ideal for storing various concoctions.
